lessons.japanese: 期待通り晴天となった。
lessons.indonesian: As had been expected, the weather turned out to be very fine.

lessons.japanese: 雨天の後には晴天が来る。
この晴天が週末まで続くことを望む。
lessons.indonesian: I hope this fine weather lasts till the weekend.

lessons.japanese: 曇天の日は晴天のときより音がよく聞こえるのです。
lessons.indonesian: On cloudy days, you can hear distant sounds better than in clear weather.

lessons.japanese: 曇天の日は晴天のときより音がよく聞こえるのです。
lessons.indonesian: You can hear sounds in the distance better on clear days than you can on cloudy days.

lessons.japanese: 万一明日雨だったら、次の晴天の日まで出発を延ばします。
lessons.indonesian: If it should rain tomorrow, I will put off my departure till the first fine day.
We had a long spell of fine weather.

lessons.japanese: 晴天を利用してフェンスにペンキを塗るほうがいいよ。
lessons.indonesian: You should take advantage of the good weather to paint the fence.

lessons.japanese: 晴天にもかかわらず、空気は冷え冷えとしていた。
lessons.indonesian: In spite of the sunny weather, the air was rather chilly.

lessons.japanese: 真っ赤な夕焼けは明日の晴天を告げた。
lessons.indonesian: The deep red of the setting sun portended fine weather.

lessons.japanese: 昨秋は晴天続きだった。
lessons.indonesian: We had a spell of fine weather last autumn.
The weather will be fair today.

lessons.japanese: 期待通り晴天となった。
lessons.indonesian: As had been expected, the weather turned out to be very fine.

lessons.japanese: 雨天の後には晴天が来る。
